ModMetaData.name: UpdatedLliscean
ModMetaData.author: Diana(Kitty), disDog
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.00 5/14/24
An update for Lliscean to 1.5.
Hailing from a distant glitterworld where genetic modification allowed their creation, those that get stranded on rimworlds often settle into idyllic (for a time at least) tribal societies. They are renown for their skill with plants and animals... and maybe more...
